rules.natural: Either the weather permits outdoor work, or if the day shift work shift is not active, then the generator has sufficient fuel.
Either the site manager supervisor is present, or the crew lead foreman is present.
Whenever the crew lead foreman is present, the weather does not permit outdoor work.
If steel beams materials are available, then rebar materials are available.
Either steel beams materials are available, or if the site manager supervisor is present, then the weather does not permit outdoor work.
In the event that phase 1 of the project is on schedule, milestone 1 deadline is met.
Should milestone 1 deadline be met, then either the crane equipment is functional, or if the day shift work shift is not active, then tools have power available.
Assuming inspection quality standards are met, then if the compactor equipment is available, concrete material is not delayed.
Provided that concrete samples testing is completed, inspection quality standards are met.
Whenever soil samples testing is completed, inspection quality standards are met.
If materials lab results are approved, then concrete samples testing is completed.
Either materials lab results are approved, or compaction field tests have passed.
In the case that compaction field tests have passed, soil samples testing is completed.
Should the excavation inspection pass, then the engineer has approved the excavation.
Given that excavation documentation is complete, the excavation inspection has passed.
If steel shipment materials are delayed, then steel beams materials are not available.
Either steel shipment materials are delayed, or beam delivery materials are damaged.
Whenever the bulldozer equipment is available, concrete material is not delayed.
Either the bulldozer equipment is available, or the compactor equipment is available.
If a safety violation by workers is observed, then crew safety training is required.
Should work be stopped due to safety concerns, the weather does not permit outdoor work.
If generator maintenance is performed, then generator maintenance is logged.
Whenever generator maintenance is logged, then if the day shift work shift is not active, tools have power available.
Should excavation work be completed, the trench safety check has passed.
If excavation work is completed, then excavation depth specification is not achieved.
Either excavation work is completed, or the day shift work shift is active.
In the event that it is not the case that if beam delivery materials are damaged then steel beams materials are not available, then backup beams materials are ordered.
Should it not be true that if backup beams materials are ordered then an alternative steel supplier has been contacted, then the steel supplier contract is terminated.
Provided that it is not the case that if crew safety training is required then work is stopped due to safety concerns, then safety training is completed.
If it is not the case that if crew safety training is required then work is stopped due to safety concerns, then safety training is not completed.
In the case that it is not the case that if the compactor equipment is available then concrete material is not delayed, then the foundation site is prepared.
Assuming it is not the case that if the compactor equipment is available then concrete material is not delayed, then the foundation site is not prepared.
Whenever it is not the case that if excavation work is completed then excavation depth specification is achieved, excavation documentation is complete.
In the event that it is not the case that if excavation work is completed then the trench safety check has not passed, then the excavation permit is approved.
Provided that it is not the case that if excavation work is completed then the trench safety check has not passed, then the excavation permit is not approved.
If it is not the case that if the day shift work shift is not active then the excavator crane is not operational, then concrete material is delayed.
If the day shift work shift is not active, then the excavator crane is operational.
Assuming the day shift work shift is not active, tools do not have power available.
